name: Perceval, the Seeker of Holy Grail
text:
When this card enters your field, reveal the top five cards of your main deck. You may put a Regalia or Knight of the Round Table among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your main deck in any order.
Banish this card: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target J-ruler of Knight of the Round Table until end of turn.
set: Faria, the Sacred Queen/Melgis, the Flame King
